title: Spline Data Asset
description: Import spline data in to Unreal
longDescription:
If you need complex splines in Unreal then the best way to generate them would be to use your 3D package. This plugin will allow you to export data from DCC application (Blender) and then import that data in to Unreal.


If the spline loops upside-down interpolating along it can cause objects to flip instead of following the spline because Unreal uses an up vector per spline knot. When importing spline data you can choose from three methods. This can help control how the spline is interpolated and make it much more predictable.

Choose from :

  • Fixed up vector
  • Frenet-Serret
  • Rotation minimising


Comes with Blueprint nodes that help build spline components. Also comes wit ha node to interpolate the spline data directly, without using a spline component, which is good for simply constraining an actor to the spline. Also comes with nodes to fetch knot data from the spline (counts, location, in/out vectors, up vectors etc.)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Export from DCC application (Blender)
  • Export single or multiple curve object
  • Import data in to Unreal as an asset
  • Choose multiple methods of up vector generation
  • Blueprint node for building spline component from data
  • Blueprint node to direct interpolate data - does not require a spline component
  • Blueprint nodes to fetch knot data from asset


Code Modules:

  •  Editor module - for importing spline data
  •  Runtime module - for interrogating and manipulating spline data


Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 6

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: Win64, Mac, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64, Mac, Linux, IOS, Android

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1q30uzJoHmPk2eG9_L_lQVi77OAsRBb_xXw3cFFTDzzs/edit?usp=sharing

Example Project: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ErvytOay_Wxj8nucwKadliht4cCZW7dU/view?usp=drive_link


Version History:

  • 1.0 Initial release
  • 1.01 Added ability to build spline data on archetype object instead of instance. Cleaned Blender scripts a little.
